official_title: To authorize appropriations for the National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services for fiscal year 1996, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services Authorization Act of 1995

summary.text: National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services Authorization Act of 1995 - Authorizes appropriations for the National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services (Department of Commerce).
